text:
I can’t keep telling you the same thing if you are just going to ignore what I’m teaching you and trying to always find a fight.
Please pause, step back, and find a way for a safe and facilitated, fact based discussion. Our family really needs it now.
robert
Message 846 of 4024
See your text to them. If it misled them that’s on you in regards to your communication.
Putting blame on me is unbelievable given the nefarious monitoring cameras you put up without my knowledge. No one believes your explanation
and if you insist we can test it out.
I still need log in credentials to the blink account I have never had knowledge of or access to. Deleting an app does not delete an account.
For employment, if you are saying you are no longer employable because of the RO, that’s your position and we will prepare our side accordingly.
The RO was a result of your direct actions. You are not the victim here but us. If you disagreed then you and lawyer should not have signed it. I
certainly did not agree to one.
Sent:01/30/2024 at 08:27 AM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 01/30/2024 at 08:41 AM)
Subject:Re: Stop the Forked Threads
Message 847 of 4024
Per below you will not be employed because of the RO.
So I should not expect any contribution from you in form of salary but clearly there are other ways to have you contribute.
Are you saying the decision for moving forward with SAAS is up to me? If this is your position that I will make a decision and inform you
accordingly.
Sent:01/30/2024 at 08:29 AM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 01/30/2024 at 08:43 AM)
Subject:Re: SAAS/Adrian
Message 848 of 4024
